title: The Lesson I Learned from Steve Jobs
text:
I first met Steve Jobs in 1984 when Apple Inc. hired me as a summer intern.

The fact that I’d landed this gig in the first place was something of a fluke; as a college student at the University of Southern California, I’d reached out to the company’s Macintosh team to complain about a bug in its software and somehow parlayed that conversation into a job.
